Articles.Content:
A couple of days ago, I bought the full version, and downloaded the game, version 0.14. Now I know there is a 0.14.1 version, and some plugins that I want need it and all, but I cant get it. When I try to use the patcher, it says something about not being able to connect to the update server. I\'ve tried to find it other places on the web, but the only place I can find it seems to have some sort of virus attached to it. So I don\'t really know what to do to get 0.14.1. Can anyone help me? Thanks!

EDIT: Well I\'m an idiot, please delete this, sorry!
The patcher is disabled. There is an announcement on that one.
